product_name: UGREEN USB Type C to USB C PD 60W/100W Cable for Apple MacBook Air 2020/MacBook Pro 2018, SAMSUNG S21/S22+/Note 20/S10, Huawei Matebook, iPad Pro 2018, Support Quick Charge4.0 USB Cord
description: There are 2 version PD 100W and PD 60W.【PD 60W Power Delivery】: UGREEN USB Type C to Type C cable supports PD fast charge up to 20V/3A (max), 15V/3A, 12V/3A, 9V/3A, 5V/3A at 60W with USB-C Power Delivery adapters such as PD 18W/30W/45W/60W/61W/87W. It also supports Huawei FCP, Qualcomm QC 3.0 and Xiaomi Fast Charge protocol, only takes 1.5h to fully recharge the MacBook Air 13"; 2.5h for iPad Pro 11"; 95mins for Xiaomi Mi 8, as fast as the original charger cable.-【Universal Compatibility】: This USB C-USB C cable compatible with all Type-C devices such as 2018 iPad Pro 12.9"/11", 2018 2017 MacBook Pro, New MacBook Air, Google Chromebook Pixel, Dell XPS 13/15; HTC U11 10, LG G5 G6 V30; Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S9, S8, Note 9 / 8 / 7, A70 , A80; Huawei P30, P20, P20 Pro, P10, P9, Mate10; OnePlus 5T, 6, 3, 3T; Google Pixel 2, 3, XL, 2XL; Nexus 5X, 6P; Xiaomi Mi 9, Mi 8, Mi A2; GoPro Hero 7 / 6 / 5; Nintendo Switch, HP Spectre X360, Asus Zenpad, Razer, etc.-【 Nylon-Braided & Aluminium Alloy 】: Nylon braided USB C to USB C cable built-in 56Ω Pull-up Resistor. With aluminium alloy shell, designed to be constructive and solids to last longer life span for customers; The strong braided cable not only avoid the tangling but also flexible enough to be wrapped up and put in a bag. A robust fast charging and data syncing USB C PD cable for daily use.-【480Mbps Data Sync】: UGREEN USB-C to USB-C 2.0 cable also supports data transfer rates up to 480Mbps, 1G files will be transferred within 30s. It is convenient and easier to transfer the files, video, video clips, photos, movies from your USB-C smartphones to your Type-C laptop in few seconds, the excellent choice to improve work efficiency and save time.-【High-Q USB C Cable】: UGREEN USB C to C fast charge cable was produced by USB-IF certified manufacturer. Humanized design with the stronger and reinforced connector on both ends, 10000+ bending test to achieve a high bending strength and good toughness. Build-in Over-Current / Over-Temperature / Short-Circuit protection to protect your devices from damages. UGREEN Tech provides 12-month hassle-free warranty.
